data.headline: Senior Product Manager | Startup Veteran
data.summary: Seasoned Product Manager with a proven track record of driving innovation and delivering successful products in the startup ecosystem. Adept at navigating complex challenges, building high-performing teams, and aligning stakeholders to achieve business objectives.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Led the development and launch of a groundbreaking SaaS platform, driving 200% user growth and a 35% increase in revenue within the first year.
Collaborated cross-functionally with engineering, design, and marketing teams to define product roadmaps and deliver innovative features.
Utilized data-driven insights to make informed decisions, optimize the user experience, and enhance product-market fit.

experience.title: Product Manager
bullets: Guided early-stage startups through the product development lifecycle, from ideation to launch, resulting in a 50% increase in successful product launches.
Mentored founders on best practices in product management, user research, and data-driven decision-making.
Managed the product portfolio and prioritized initiatives to align with the accelerator's strategic objectives.

projects.name: Startup Accelerator Product Management Bootcamp
projects.description: Developed and delivered a comprehensive product management training program for early-stage startup founders.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. The candidate is a middle-aged man with short, dark hair and a friendly, confident expression. He is wearing a blue collared shirt and a neutral background.
